law.text:
Subject to the limitations and immunities of this subtitle, the purpose of this subtitle is to provide:
a means to pay indemnities to persons that suffer injuries arising out of the rendering of or failure to render professional services by lawyers;
a means for lawyers to obtain insurance against liability for injuries arising out of the rendering of or failure to render professional services; and
property insurance and casualty insurance related or incidental to practicing law.
